attributes.additional_details: We should have a uniform for teachers and helpers. Most other jobs have uniforms and its only right that teachers do. Teachers take child out of schools for trips, and children have to wear uniforms to help teachers keep a eye on whos with them. The public can't tell who are with the children as they wear their own chose of clothing . Uniform is about safty. Tbere for safty has been missed in schools. All teachers should lead by example.
attributes.background: Would like to see school uniform with school logo for teachers and helpers

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

This is a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. Schools already have a responsibility to ensure the health and safety of teachers and pupils on school trips.
